title: Ep 242: A Huge Heart and a Tiny... w/ Eric Stonestreet
itunes:title: Ep 242: A Huge Heart and a Tiny... w/ Eric Stonestreet
description: Bobby likes the upstairs buffet. Eric thinks the glasses are stupid. Khalyla challenges you to a blind sit-up. We talk Soviet newscasters, shocker variations, Roger's happy state, and 90 Day Fianće.   Recorded in our respective homes via Zoom.
